item.title: Are you an introvert? Investing in business is the road to success
item.description: It is easy to imagine that introverts see their qualities as an obstacle in their careers, especially when our culture glorifies the hustle and charisma.

item.title: Here are expert tips to invest in the stock exchange
item.description: With the cost of living, price inflation and the burdens of everyday life, Hamed, a salesperson for a major electronics store in Kuwait for nearly nine years, is trying to find a way to improve his limited income.
